successes.title: Zpocalypse: An Epic Zombie Survival Board Game
successes.description: Our game combines combat, resource collection, character development and team strategy with the goal of surviving a zombie apocalypse.

Pledges.description: Please see the main page for updated level descriptions. Most levels have been upgraded with new content AND updated S&H costs.

<Getting By > 
You'll get a set of our custom made Zpocalypse dice - 4 red dice! [Free shipping to the US] [Add $5 S&H for destinations outside the US]
<You've Found a Knife> 4 dice + 5 custom wallpapers to download, and a custom dice tower! [Free shipping to the US] [Add $5 S&H for destinations outside the US]

<Shotgun > 
You'll get a copy of Zpocalypse, 5 custom wallpapers to download and a signed print of Ricky Casdorph's artwork. [Add $15 S&H for Canada] [Add $35 S&H for all other destinations outside the US]

<Shotgun with a Flak Jacket> 8 dice, 5 wallpapers, dice tower, Zpocalypse, and a signed print of Ricky Casdorph's artwork. [Add $15 S&H for Canada] [Add $35 S&H for all other destinations outside the US]

<Squad Commander with Dual MP5’s>  This level includes all previous level content plus your own custom Tactical Squad Board:  You will get to choose the background, squad name and other details that give your undead command central that nice personal touch. 
Please see additional details of S&H or bonus content to the left.

<Squad Commander with Dual MP5’s Going out Scarface Style> This level includes all previous level content plus your own custom Tactical Squad Board: You will get to choose the background, squad name and other details that give your undead command center that nice personal touch. Please see additional details of S&H or bonus content to the left.

<Squad Commander with Assault Bacon> This level includes all previous level content, plus a new weapon card, and additional 4 tile set! The tiles are double sided for a total of 8 new locations!  Both the weapon card and tile set will be voted upon in the special development page. 
Please see additional details of S&H or bonus content to the left.

<Squad Commander Banging on the Bunker Door> This level contains everything that comes in the $125 level.  You will get Zpocalypse with the K-mini, and  Z-Master expansions. You also get the dice tower, custom dice, a print, a custom Squad Board, and 1 Survivor card with your likeness in your copy of the game. Please see additional details of S&H or bonus content to the left.

<Squad Commander Bitten Outside the Bunker Door> It's better to be late to the party than not at all! This level contains everything that comes in the $125 level. You will get Zpocalypse with the K-mini, and Z-Master expansions. You also get the dice tower, custom dice, a print, a custom Squad Board, and 1 Survivor card with your likeness in your copy of the game. Please see additional details of S&H or bonus content to the left.
$128 < Undead Squad Commander >

It's better to be eating everyone at party than not to be there at all! This level contains everything that comes in the $125 level. You will get Zpocalypse with the K-mini, and Z-Master expansions. You also get the dice tower, custom dice, a print, a custom Squad Board, and 1 Survivor card with your likeness in your copy of the game. Please see additional details of S&H or bonus content to the left.

< Rotting Squad Commander, Head Chopped Off > It's better to be eating everyone at party than not to be there at all! This level contains everything that comes in the $125 level. You will get Zpocalypse with the K-mini, and Z-Master expansions. You also get the dice tower, custom dice, a print, a custom Squad Board, and 1 Survivor card with your likeness in your copy of the game. Please see additional details of S&H or bonus content to the left.

<MP5 on the Lookout Tower> 
Limited Edition - You will get everything from the level "Shotgun with a Flak Jacket" and your likeness will be in your copy of the  game as a survivor. You will have your own unique survivor card that no one else will receive. We will work with you on writing your own bio and special ability.

<The Foreign Legion> - you will get 2 copies of <Shotgun with a Flak Jacket>, 2 custom squad boards, 4 custom Survivor or Avatar cards, 2 custom weapon cards AND FREE 
INTERNATIONAL SHIPPING! [This is the only level where S&H is included for all]

<Male Lead> Be one of the Male Survivors in our main game!  You will get all content thus far AND you get to pick 1 of your Survivor cards to be in the main game shipped with every copy. Please see additional details of S&H or bonus content to the left.

<Female Lead> Be one of the Female Survivors in our main game!  You will get all content thus far AND you get to pick 1 of your Survivor cards to be in the main game shipped with every copy. Please see additional details of S&H or bonus content to the left.

<Undead Lead> you will get everything from <Squad Commander with Assault Bacon> and have your facial likeness in the Z-Master Deck. Your zombified self, artistically rendered by Ricky, will be on 3 cards in the game denotating the level of control the Zombie master has over the zombies on the board! Please see additional details of S&H or bonus content to the left.

<Undead Full Lead> you will get everything from <Squad Commander with Assault Bacon> and have your whole body likeness in the Z-Master Deck. Your whole body likeness in undead splendor will be artistically rendered by Ricky and found on 4 cards in the game denotating the level of speed the Zombies can move on the board! Please see additional details of S&H or bonus content to the left.

<The Cure> You will get everything found in the previous levels, but the members of Greenbrier Games will all personally sign your copy of the game. Then several team members will hand deliver your copy in order to sit down and play the game with you and your friends. You must be within 200 miles of Boston.

<Operation Z>  You get 4 copies of the <Shotgun with a Flak Jacket> level, plus travel vouchers worth up to $400 total for you and three companions to visit us for a weekend of slaying zombies. Hotel accommodations will be included. We will offer a tour of our publisher’s facilities and offer four $50 vouchers to redeem more games from the Myriad Games store. We will hold a feast in your honor, and Julie will make you crème brûlée. Did we mention the designer has draft beer at his house? Please see additional details of S&H or bonus content to the left.
